content:
In context to CMS does the EOB resource stores only the adjudicated claims; if so then how are the rest of the code valueset being used of element EOB.outcome
http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-remittance-outcome.html

The other context which comes in is the valueset is being pinted to remittance so is the outcome column being used instead for payment process status from the payer?
